\begin{kframe}
\noindent{\color{srccolor}> getFromDB}
\noindent{\color{outcolor}function (dir, file, table, where = "", dsn, sql) }
\noindent{\color{outcolor}\{}
\noindent{\color{outcolor}    if (!inherits(try(dsn, silent = TRUE), "try-error")) \{}
\noindent{\color{outcolor}        ODBC.get(dsn = dsn, sql = sql)}
\noindent{\color{outcolor}    \}}
\noindent{\color{outcolor}    else \{}
\noindent{\color{outcolor}        ACCESS.get(dir = dir, file = file, table = table, }
\noindent{\color{outcolor}            where = where)}
\noindent{\color{outcolor}    \}}
\noindent{\color{outcolor}\}}
